LanguageData.Apparel_FirefoampopPack.label: firefoam pop pack
LanguageData.Apparel_FirefoampopPack.description: A utility pack made for firefighters. When triggered, a burst of fire-retardant foam is released, covering a wide circle around its wearer.
LanguageData.Apparel_SmokepopBelt.label: smokepop pack
LanguageData.Apparel_SmokepopBelt.description: A defensive smokescreen. When activated, it will release a cloud of smoke, obscuring incoming shots and preventing turrets from locking on.
